translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その調子で治せよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep healing at that pace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この馬鹿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主であるサテラを心配させて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You made your master, Satella, worried!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞳に涙を浮かべたサテラが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, with tears welling in her eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷりぷりと怒っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was angrily pouting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく分からんが心配していたのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand, but you were worried?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、使徒が死にかけたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, if the Apostle nearly dies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配するのは主として当然だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's only natural for the master to be worried.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……二度と、あんな醜態は晒すな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Never show such an ugly spectacle again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは主としての命令だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is an order from your master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、はいはい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yeah, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、あんなと言われてもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even if you say 'such a thing'...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は何がどうなっていたんだか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really know what was going on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、ランス様は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイに殴り飛ばされて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was punched away by Red Eye...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうだ、崖下まで落とされたんだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That's right, you were thrown off the cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー、良かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, that's good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を覚ましたんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've woken up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、健太郎か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, Kentarou, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「崖下に落ちてったランスさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance who fell off the cliff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕が引き上げたんですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I pulled him up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕なら崖下に落ちても死なないので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because if it's me, I wouldn't die even if I fell off the cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「血まみれで体中が変な方に向いてるし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was covered in blood and his body was bent in strange directions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正直、あ、これもう駄目かなーって思いました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, I thought, 'Oh, this might be over.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐすっ……う、うう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *sniff*... U-uh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、嘘です。大丈夫だなって思いました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, just kidding. I thought he was going to be okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当本当、平気でしたよシィルさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, really, he was fine, Seale-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の助けなんぞなくても楽勝なのに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I could have handled it easily without your help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、余計なことをしおって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, doing unnecessary things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せっかく助けたのにひどいなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's terrible after I went to the trouble to help you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、カオスはどうなった！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what happened to Chaos!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスさんなら、そちらに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's about Chaos, he's over there—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーーう、やっと目を覚ましたか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ohhh, you finally woke up...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部の少し離れた場所では、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little distance away from the supreme commander headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀身を折られたカオスがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, whose blade had been broken, was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なっさけない姿だなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What a pathetic sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、お互い様じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, we're even.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、どうするよ、ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what will you do, Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにがだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do what?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、この子らと話してたんじゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was just talking with these kids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが負けた以上は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Rance lost,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げるべきではないか、とな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking maybe you should run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かにレッドアイに負けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, you lost to Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ方法も分からん状況。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you don't even know how to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げても誰も文句なんて言わんぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No one would complain if you ran away.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was just talking with these kids.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, you lost to Red Eye,
